title: Lessons from Emerging Market Economies on the Sources of Sustained Growth
content: - 18 -            ______ (2004).  “The Washington Consensus as Policy Prescription for Development,”   speech in the series “Practitioners of Development” delivered at the World Bank,  Washington, January 13 (more information is available at  http://info.worldbank.org/etools/Bspan/PresentationView.asp?PID=1003&EID=3 28).     World Bank (2005).  Economic Growth in the 1990s:  Learning From a Decade of   Reform.  Washington:  World Bank.
